author: zongaro
msg: 1) Renamed getNodeValue method in XSLTC's DOM to getStringValueX - meaning "get
the string value of a node according to XPath's definition."  The old
getNodeValue overrode DTM's getNodeValue with slightly different semantics and
a slightly higher cost in terms of performance.
2) Reworked copyElement to improve performance of node copying.

author: zongaro
msg: 1) Turn off node indexing for XSLTC's DTM objects.  No iterators or traversers
that XSLTC uses take advantage of it, so it's pure overhead.
2) Renamed getNodeValue method in XSLTC's DOM to getStringValueX - meaning "get
the string value of a node according to XPath's definition."  The old
getNodeValue overrode DTM's getNodeValue with slightly different semantics and
a slightly higher cost in terms of performance.

author: zongaro
msg: Renamed getNodeValue method in XSLTC's DOM to getStringValueX - meaning "get
the string value of a node according to XPath's definition."  The old
getNodeValue overrode DTM's getNodeValue with slightly different semantics and
a slightly higher cost in terms of performance.

author: zongaro
msg: Turn off node indexing for XSLTC's DTM objects.  No iterators or traversers
that XSLTC uses take advantage of it, so it's pure overhead.

author: sboag
msg: Integrated new grammar from Nov. 15th draft, with a small tweak to allow multiple
comparison expressions (to allow success of xpath1 parsing).
